text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a CRINV

name: RoleClassClinicalResearchInvestigator
title: RoleClassClinicalResearchInvestigator
description: A role played by a provider, always a person, who has agency authority from a Clinical Research Sponsor to direct the conduct of a clinical research trial or study on behalf of the sponsor.
